title: Help Game Won't Start
body: When I click Reconnect it says "An Unknown DirectX error has occurred and League can not start. Please make sure your video card is using latest drivers from manufacture" This happened ironically after I just updated them. Do I have to out date them to play league again?

replies.body: The update performed may not have installed properly, and failing to render the game.  Go over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to tune up your settings, and get back in-game.  If necessary, you could also try rolling back to help rule out the possibility of your update causing the issue.  Just test it out in a custom game, though, to prevent any penalties.  Hope it helps!
